server.description: The URL address of the Eik server where packages are published to.

name.description: The name of the Eik package. Follows the same rules as for NPM package names. Must be parseable by validate-npm-package-name package, which is bundled with npm as a dependency.

version.description: The version of the Eik package. Follows the same rules as for NPM package versions. Must be parseable by node-semver, which is bundled with npm as a dependency.

files.description: File mapping definition for the package. Keys represent files or paths to be created on the Eik Server. Values represent paths to local files to be published.

import-map.description: Import map files given by URL(s) to be used during package bundling. Specified as a URL or array of URLs. URLs are locations of import map files that follow the W3C import map spec.

out.description: Location of local Eik build directory (defaults to .eik). Used by Eik client.
